extendedInfo.description: Save photo from Facebook - Lightweight, practical -  No login required It's a simple but powerful tool for the Facebook app in which you can do a Facebook photo download and save it.It lets you download and save your favorite Facebook's photos in the internal memory or the sd card of your phone.Once saved, you can enjoy your pictures at any time, without relying on the internet.You already know how to share files, images, pictures and video between applications such as Twitter, Whatsapp, Line, Instagram, LinkedIn, Foursquare, Gmail, Dropbox and many more.Once installed, "Download photos from Facebook" will be available in this list of sharing options.How does it work? Simple!Open Facebook app, choose the picture you want to download, tap on your device's menu button, tap on share and then select "Download photos from Facebook" icon.Now just choose the destination (phone or SD card) and instantly the image will be available in your device's photo gallery in a folder called "Facebook Photos"Enjoy! :)Other features.â Fastest Facebook photo downloadâ No login required.(No need to enter your facebook account or password)â It's free and has no limitations.â Enjoy your downloaded photos without relying on 3G or Internet connection.â It is ultra lightweight. Uses very little storage space.â Don't need special permissions.â Save images in the highest possible quality.â Design attractive and simple user interface.REMEMBERFacebook photo download is a complement for Facebook application.IF YOU RUN THE APPLICATION YOU WILL SEE THE INSTRUCTIONS.IF YOU LIKE OUR WORK, PLEASE DO NOT FORGET THE STARS.;)

reviews.title: Gr8 and Easy
reviews.comment: Fantastic App .. and quite user friendly also.  Hats off to developers

reviews.title: Helpful :)
reviews.comment: It is easy to use! I love the app! I can download pictures through my phone fast & easy!

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Works fine n very simple to use good work

reviews.title: Cool app 5 stars
reviews.comment: Cool app it does what it says free.. that\'s good enough fot me ... keep up the great free downloader apps

reviews.title: Simple to use
reviews.comment: The user interface is amazing best app at what it does highly recommend

reviews.title: Nice and handy
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Nice & easy to use. Faster downloads.

reviews.title: Ya got the app what i wants
reviews.comment: As in samsung phones we have choice to save the photos from facebook but in other phones like micromax canvas series there is no such option. Thanks to the developer its so fine app works really well very simple to use.thats perfect 5 star app
reviews.author: Sudhanshu Shukla

reviews.title: Works excellently with Facebook and also with whatsapp...
reviews.comment: There is no direct method to grab photos on Facebook and. many other social sites. This application gives you perfect solution .
reviews.author: prashant karnik

reviews.title: Good but could be improved
reviews.comment: If I could set defaults in the app for storage locations so that when u click \'Download photos from Facebook\' when sharing a photo it downloads instantly without having to go to another page
reviews.author: Elias Chako Mangoro

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!
reviews.comment: If you see a pic on Facebook and you really want it for your phone gallery but can\'t download it...Then,this is the app you have been looking for! You can NOW get ANY photo from Facebook to add to you photo gallery! A must have app if you love pics on Facebook!!! :D
reviews.author: george turner

reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
reviews.comment: It is very hassle-free. Transport Facebook photos to your device with this app now!
reviews.author: Azl Sy

reviews.comment: A much less time - consuming method for adding Facebook photos that were already in your Facebook Albums to a recently acquired Smartphone. Thank you!
reviews.author: Sharon Perry

reviews.title: Could use some cleaning up
reviews.comment: You could clean up the interface a little. I personally don\'t like the front-page-of-a-magazine appearance it has right now. Other than that it is really easy to use :)

reviews.title: Half good but functional
reviews.comment: Baja las fotos esta muy bien hace lo que dice actualizen a un mejor icono es la cara de la app,
reviews.author: Jack Collins

reviews.title: Have 3 till app is fixed
reviews.comment: Good app but it\'s only giving me one option to save the pictures and that\'s to my SD card. No option to save to my phone. It\'s the something I\'m missing?

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: Awesome app. For downloading pics from facebook. After one year search finally I got what I.exactly wanted... Wud advice it to everyone.
